name: Sticky Troubles
description:
A game where you are miner stuck in a cave, farming slimes. You need to have one or more slimes, but whenever new slime spawns, your health gets reduced, so the slime can have it.

Made by IKDev in  a week for BTP GameJam #3, hosted by Blackthornprod (yt: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g). Also my first 3D game

CONTROLS:

Move with WASD, kill slimes with LMB. That's it.
